text:
Stephen Adam Amell (born May 8, 1981) is a Canadian actor and producer. He is best known for playing Green Arrow in The CW superhero series "Arrow" (2012–2020). He has also appeared as the character in "The Flash" (2014–2019), "Vixen" (2015–2016), "DC's Legends of Tomorrow" (2016–2020), "Supergirl" (2017–2019) and "Batwoman" (2019). His other credits include the HBO series "Hung" (2011) and the movies ' (2016) and "Code 8" (2019).
Amell was born in Toronto, Ontario. He is a first cousin of actor Robbie Amell. He was married to Carolyn Lawrence from 2007 to 2010. He married actress and model Cassandra Jean in 2012. The couple's daughter was born in 2013.
